strings.Value: "You're waiting for new recruits, right? I was told to introduce myself to the Stag Lord."
"I'm an envoy of Restov and the Swordlords. Inform the Stag Lord that I'm here to fight him. If he's as fierce as rumors say, he'll accept my challenge."
[Attack] "I'm here to spare the Stolen Lands from your kind!"
[Leave] "I'm just a simple traveler who lost my way! I'll leave immediately!"
"I bring a message from the river camp for Akiros!"
"Stop! Who's there?" {n}A sentry calls out to you lazily, an obvious demonstration of how self-assured the bandits here are.{/n}
"What, those mites steal the Stag Lord's wine again? Ugh, fine, go on and give your report."
"I don't remember him saying anything about you. He's a strict man, Akiros is. He wouldn't forget to mention something like that."
"Like he's got nothing better to do than greet every flea that comes to visit. Well, go on, I guess. Maybe it'll provide some entertainment!"
"Ha! I know about 'recruits' like you. Get out of here, before I call my commander."

{n}The sentry scratches the back of his head.{/n} "So, what, I gotta go wake up the commander? These {g|Restov}Restovic{/g} challengers just keep coming... Make me run in, report to the commander, then clean up their corpses... All right, fine, just wait here. I'll go talk to the commander."
"Ha ha! You have to make it inside, first! Oh, but look at these brave fighters here!"
"Get out of here, traveler! Count yourself lucky the commander's asleep and I'm in a good mood â€” otherwise, I'd just call the others in to fill you with feathers."
